t: Amazon.com: HeatnBond: Soft Stretch
s: HeatnBond Soft Stretch is a double-sided iron-on adhesive for binding stretch fabrics or when you need to maintain a very soft hand. Available in both No Sew Ultra and Sewable Lite

t: Amazon.com: HeatnBond: Sprays
s: SpraynBond Basting Adhesive is a temporary bond spray adhesive for fabric. Use it in your design phase for pattern piecing and determining appliqué placement. Great for holding templates onto fabric and assembling landscape quilts.

t: Amazon.com: HeatnBond: Iron-On Adhesives
s: HeatnBond Iron-On Adhesives are paper backed, iron-on, sew and no-sew, double-sided adhesive for bonding fabric without the need for pinning. Their bond is stronger than traditional fusible webs. The solid sheet adhesive means edge to edge coverage for appliqué shapes on quilts, wall hangings ...
